project_abstract.cdata: The project will provide assistance to 10 Rural Development Areas, two of which will be developed intensively. The project includes components for (a) strengthening and developing extension services and infrastructure, (b) livestock development, (c) land development and construction works, (d) incremental agricultural inputs, (e) credit services, (f) access and feeder roads, (g) social infrastructure development, (h) central management services, and (i) studies and training.
